      24                 :            :    * AnuGA format with extension .SWW
      25                 :            :    *
      26                 :            :    * The format is based on NetCDF storage
      27                 :            :    *
      28                 :            :    * Bed Elevation can be static (== one bed elevation for all timesteps, stored
      29                 :            :    * in "z" variable or "elevation" variable)

      31                 :            :    * variable with multiple dimensions)
      32                 :            :    *
      33                 :            :    * Vector data are recognized by prefix "x" and "y" in the name
      34                 :            :    * Maximums data are recognized by suffix "_range" in the name
